name: Specklebelly Goose Calls - Electronic Caller
description:
Want an affordable specklebelly goose hunting eCaller? The Specklebelly GoosePro electronic specklebelly goose calls caller app provides you REAL specklebelly goose hunting calls at your fingertips. These specklebelly goose calls are clear, crisp and recorded from REAL specklebelly geese. 5 unique specklebelly goose hunting soundtracks included. Connect the app to your speaker and amplifier system to play the specklebelly goose hunting calls loud.

FEATURES:
- 5 specklebelly goose hunting calls
- Effective, realistic and clear specklebelly goose calls
- Bluetooth compatible to sync to a Bluetooth speaker
- Specklebelly goose hunting calls can play in the background of your phone allowing you to text, take pictures and surf the internet without disrupting the specklebelly goose calling sounds
- The soundtracks allow you to set the specklebelly goose calls and focus on specklebelly goose hunting
- Connect to your speaker system with audio cables or Bluetooth (cables not included)
- No more forgetting to grab your MP3 player or memory cards, you always have your phone with you
- E-Calling audio for calling specklebelly geese at a fraction of the cost of purchasing multiple soundtracks and memory cards separately

Soundtracks included in "Specklebelly GoosePro"
- Specklebelly Greeting
- Specklebelly Comeback
- Specklebelly Clucking
- Specklebelly & Snow Geese
- Specklebelly Double

Download Specklebelly GoosePro and start having specklebelly goose hunting success today!
